itunes:title: Episode 063: Nate Grey (feat. Zack Jenkins)
title: Episode 063: Nate Grey (feat. Zack Jenkins)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 63 of CEREBRO — a slightly belated X-Mas spectacular — Connor and Battle of the Atom co-host Zack Jenkins illuminate Nate Grey, the eccentric X-Man! The rough equivalent of Cable in the dystopian Age of Apocalypse reality, Nate survived that event and somehow led a solo title for 75 issues. Good for him! More recently, he served as a major antagonist in the franchise-wide events X-Men: Disassembled and Age of X-Man.

The CEREBRO character file on X-Man begins at 45:31.

(Content Advisory: Nate's story includes incest, torture, genocide, and brainwashing. This episode discusses a plot involving the death of an infant.)



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
